level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-236
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-236, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1207.02.

level.heading: Expiration of law Expiration of Law 10-236
level.text: Section 6(b) of D.C. Law 10-236 provided that the act shall expire 3 years after having taken effect. D.C. Law 10-236, which added §§ 1-2261 to 1-2263 §§ 2-1213.01 to 2-1213.03, 2001 Ed., became effective on March 21, 1995.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-236
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-236, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1207.02.

level.heading: Expiration of law Expiration of Law 10-236
level.text: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-1213.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Revision of subchapter: D.C. Law 12-26 revised this subchapter by renumbering former §§ 1-2271 through 1-2291 as §§ 1-2272 through 1-2292 [§§ 2-1215.02 through 2-1215.22, 2001 Ed.], and by adding § 1-2271 [§ 2-1215.01, 2001 Ed.].
